data.name: Admin_CannotDeleteCreator
data.value: The creator of a hackathon cannot be deleted.

data.name: Admin_NotFound
data.value: The specified user is not an admin of the hackathon

data.name: Auth_Forbidden
data.value: Forbidden. The user associated with the token doesn't have proper permission. Please contact the administrator for access.

data.name: Auth_TokenExpired
data.value: Token expired at {0}. Please re-login.

data.name: Auth_Token_ValidateRemoteFailed
data.value: The access token cannot be validated. Code:{0}, Message:{1}

data.name: Auth_Unauthorized
data.value: Token is either missing or invalid. Please add it to Http request headers: Headers["Authorization"]=token TOKEN.

data.name: AwardAssignment_NotFound
data.value: The assignment is not found.

data.name: Award_CannotDeleteAssigned
data.value: The award is assigned hence cannot delete. Please delete the assignments first.

data.name: Award_CannotUpdateTarget
data.value: `award.target` cannot be updated since the award is already assigned to a team or user. Please delete the assignment(s) first.

data.name: Award_NotFound
data.value: Award with specified id is not found.

data.name: Award_TooMany
data.value: A maximum of 100 awards are allowed.

data.name: Award_TooManyAssignments
data.value: Cannot assign the award to more than {0} assignees.

data.name: Enrollment_Ended
data.value: Enrollment already ended at {0}

data.name: Enrollment_Full
data.value: Enrollment cannot be fullfilled since it has reached the quota.

data.name: Enrollment_NotApproved
data.value: Enrollment not approved yet. Please contact the hackathon admistrators for approval.

data.name: Enrollment_NotFound
data.value: User {0} not enrolled in hackathon {1}

data.name: Enrollment_NotStarted
data.value: Enrollment not started. The enrollment will be accepted starting from {0}

data.name: Enrollment_TooManyExtensions
data.value: Count of extensions exceeds the allowed limit {0}.

data.name: Hackathon_AlreadyOnline
data.value: Hackathon {0} is already Online.

data.name: Hackathon_CreateTooMany
data.value: The user created too many hackathons, please try again at a later time or contact the administrator.

data.name: Hackathon_Deleted
data.value: Hackathon {0} is Offline. Cannot be updated.

data.name: Hackathon_Ended
data.value: The hackathon is already ended at {0}

data.name: Hackathon_Name_Invalid
data.value: The name is invalid. Must contain only letters and/or numbers, length between 1 and 100.

data.name: Hackathon_Name_Taken
data.value: The name is already used. Please try another name.

data.name: Hackathon_NotAdmin
data.value: Access denied. Only the admins of the hackathon are allowed. Please contact the admin to request access.

data.name: Hackathon_NotFound
data.value: Hackathon with name `{0}` not found. Try PUT to create a new one.

data.name: Hackathon_NotJudge
data.value: Access denied. Only the judges of the hackathon are allowed. Please contact the admin to request access.

data.name: Hackathon_NotStarted
data.value: The hackathon is not started yet.

data.name: Hackathon_ReadOnly
data.value: Hackathon is archived and is ReadOnly.

data.name: Hackathon_UnhandledException
data.value: An unexpected exception occurs. Please try again later or report an issue at https://github.com/kaiyuanshe/open-hackathon/issues

data.name: Judge_NotFound
data.value: The specified user is not judge of the hackathon.

data.name: Judge_TooMany
data.value: A maximum of 100 judges are allowed.

data.name: Parameter_Required
data.value: Required parameter {0} is null or empty.

data.name: Rating_HasRating
data.value: Cannot delete the {0}. Must delete related Rating first.

data.name: Rating_KindNotFound
data.value: The rating kind of specified Id doesn't exist.

data.name: Rating_NotFound
data.value: The rating is not found.

data.name: Rating_OnlyCreator
data.value: Access denied. The rating is created by another person.

data.name: Rating_ScoreNotInRange
data.value: The score must be not greater than {0}.

data.name: Rating_TooManyKinds
data.value: A maximum of 100 rating kinds are allowed.

data.name: TeamMember_AccessDenied
data.value: Member {0} is not allowed to perform this operation.

data.name: TeamMember_LastAdmin
data.value: The user cannot be removed since there are more than 1 members and the user is the only admin with admin access.

data.name: TeamMember_NotFound
data.value: Member {0} is not a member of team {1}

data.name: TeamWork_NotFound
data.value: The team work cannot be found.

data.name: TeamWork_TooMany
data.value: A maximum of 100 works are allowed.

data.name: Team_CreateSecond
data.value: Cannot create a new team since the user is already in a team.

data.name: Team_HasAward
data.value: Cannot delete the team for awards are assigned to this team. Please delete the award assignments first.

data.name: Team_NameTaken
data.value: The team name '{0}' is already taken. Please try a different name.

data.name: Team_NotAdmin
data.value: Access denied. Please contact admins of the team.

data.name: Team_NotEnrolled
data.value: Cannot create a new team. must enroll first.

data.name: Team_NotFound
data.value: Team with specified id is not found.

data.name: User_NotFound
data.value: The specified user is not found.
